name: Amstel Grand Hotel
description: Charming 5-star hotel along the Amstel River, blending Dutch heritage with modern comfort. Ideal for luxury getaways in the heart of the city.

name: Canal Palace
description: Wake up to dreamy canal views at this boutique hotel in Jordaan. The perfect stay for romantic weekends or cozy solo trips in Amsterdam.

name: Muse Hotel Amsterdam
description: Steps from Museumplein, this artsy hotel blends modern style and walkable location. A great pick for culture lovers and art explorers.

name: Vondel Retreat
description: Just minutes from Vondelpark, this eco-conscious hotel offers calm vibes and a garden courtyard. Great for mindful travelers.

name: Harbor View Inn
description: Modern hotel with panoramic harbor views, near the NDSM art scene. Ideal for creatives and design fans visiting Amsterdam.

name: De Pijp Design Hotel
description: A stylish stay in De Pijp – the trendiest district in Amsterdam. Surrounded by cafes, markets, and indie shops.

name: Golden Gables
description: Historic Dutch gables, boutique interiors. Stay where charm meets convenience near the Nine Streets shopping area.

name: Jordaan Hideaway
description: A peaceful escape in one of Amsterdam’s coziest neighborhoods. Great for slow mornings and exploring on foot.

name: Dockside Loft
description: Industrial loft-style hotel close to ferry lines and creative hubs. Popular with digital nomads and minimalist travelers.

name: Blue House Canal Hotel
description: Iconic blue building right on the canal. Quiet, quaint, and made for postcard-perfect memories in Amsterdam.

name: Urban Tulip Hotel
description: Modern floral-themed hotel near the famous flower market. Fresh, vibrant, and full of local flair.

name: Bicycle Boutique
description: Bike-themed hotel that’s fun, friendly, and perfect for adventurers. Ride in, check in, explore Amsterdam like a local.
